item.title: The tree on the pavement outside 18 Greenways was hit by a car, 10th August
item.description:
An accident happened at 8.30pm on Saturday 9th August where a car hit a tree and overturned outside 18 Greenways. Police and Fire Brigade attended the scene so I hope they assessed the tree for risk. However, it would be good if an official assessment was done, if it hasn't been already, to ensure the tree is not at risk of falling in high winds as a lot of families walk along this pavement including mine on a regular basis. The tree looks surprisingly straight at the moment, but bark was removed due to the impact with the car.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Greenways, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet
